casebody.data:
J. OTTMANN LITHOGRAPHING CO., Respondent, v. EQUITABLE BANK Appellant. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. January 3, 1893.) Action by the J. Ottmann Lithographing Company against the Equitable Bank. From judgment of trial term, rendered by the court without a jury, defendant appeals.

Arguéd before FREEDMAN and GILDERSLEEVE, JJ.

Charles F. McLean, (Edward W. Crittenden, of counsel,) for appellant. Goepel & Raegener, (Benj. B. Kenyon, of counsel,) for respondent. PER CURIAM.

The judgment appealed from is affirmed, with costs, on the opinion of the court below.
